title.rendered: Air Caraibes in Les Abymes, Guadeloupe, France

content.rendered:
Air Caraibes is a French airline and is the regional airline of the French Caribbean which comprises two overseas departments of France: Guadeloupe and Martinique. It was founded on 1969. The airline is headquartered in Les Abymes in Guadeloupe. It operates scheduled and charter services serving 13 islands in the West Indies. It also operates transatlantic flights to Paris using Airbus A330 aircraft under the Air Caraïbes Atlantique brand. The airline code shares with LIAT. Its main base is Pointe-à-Pitre International Airport, with a hub at Le Lamentin Airport, Le Lamentin, near Fort-de-France.

Air Caraibese in Les Abymes, Guadeloupe, France Contact Address, Phone, Email and Website

Air Caraibes Address: Les Abymes, Guadeloupe, France

Air Caraibes Phone: 0820835835

Email: NA

Opening hours: Monday to Saturday 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.
Sunday and public holidays from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Air Caraibes Official website: www.aircaraibes.com/

Air Caraibes Online Check-in: www.aircaraibes.com/en/check-in-online

Note: Online check-in is available 48 hours to 30 minutes prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Air Caraibes flight status here: www.aircaraibes.com/flight status

Air Caraibes Baggage Allowance

View Air Caraibes Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travelling while pregnant in Air Caraibes

Pregnancy rules in Air Caraibes:

  • Less than 6 month Pregnant mother can travel, a medical certificate is not required to fly.
  • Upto 6 and 8 months pregnant, you must present a medical certificate to Air.

For more details visit: https://en.aircaraibes.com/en/passengers-special-requirements#Pregnant%20women

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Caraibes

Total fleet: 13

  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A330-300
  • Airbus A350-900
  • Airbus A350-1000
  • ATR 72-600

Queries handled by Air Caraibes Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Preference

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Caraibes in Les Abymes, Guadeloupe, France Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Caraibes in Les Abymes, Guadeloupe, France: (click on the stars below)
